images.caption: Figure 2:a) An example execution ofFigureËœ1(a), in which natural code uses shared program state. b) The Python interpreter reads and writes to the program state, such as by writing the variablequery. c) The Python interpreter hands the execution control to the LLM to execute the natural code. d) The LLM emits ağ–«ğ—ˆğ—ˆğ—„ğ—ğ—‰\mathsf{Lookup}request to read thequeryvariable. e) The handler readsqueryfrom the shared scopes, f) which has the value"Exit, please."g) The handler resumes natural code execution with the value ofquery. h) The LLM emits another request,ğ–¦ğ—ˆğ—ğ—ˆ\mathsf{Goto}, to update the evaluation context to thebreakprogram label (i.e. outside thewhile-loop). Finally, i) the handler manipulates the control state accordingly without resuming natural code execution, implementing control flow.
